items.sentence: If it hadn't been for your advice, I couldn't have succeeded.
I've been waiting for your reply, but haven't heard from you.
Without a passport, leaving a country is out of the question.
Two people riding on a bicycle at the same time is dangerous.
Tom's favorite food is bread, but he also eats a lot of rice.
Tom was sitting here for a while and then he got up and left.
Tom was buried in the cemetery next to the church he went to.
Tom is in the living room, telling his grandchildren a story.
Tom has worked hard to save up enough money to go to college.
Tom's decision to disobey his captain's orders was a bad one.
